main.name: Pragnesh Rana
main.description: Data Scientist and AI Engineer with expertise in Gen-AI, RAG, LLMs, Deep Learning, and Multi-Agent Systems
main.bio: I am a passionate and results-driven data scientist specializing in building AI-driven solutions, including multi-agent systems, retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), and fine-tuned large language models (LLMs). With a research-based master's degree from IIT Madras, I focus on driving innovation through data-driven strategies that lead to continuous growth and success. My expertise spans Gen-AI, deep learning, cloud-native architectures, and AI-powered decision systems, which I have applied across various industries such as Pharma, Auto, and Finance. I am committed to creating scalable, impactful systems that optimize decision-making processes and improve business outcomes. Always focused on continuous learning, I actively pursue workshops and certifications to stay at the cutting edge of technological advancements and contribute to solving complex challenges with innovative AI solutions.
main.contactmessage: Reach out for AI-driven solutions, collaborations, or discussions on ML, DL, RAG, and LLMs.

resume.skillmessage: Proficient in Gen-AI, Multi-Agent Systems, and AI-driven decision-making.

education.degree: MS by Research in Computational Mathematics & Mechanical
education.description: Focused on Machine Learning, Numerical Methods, and AI-driven research. Developed regression-based clustering algorithms achieving 93% accuracy.
Studied computational modeling, simulation techniques and engineering applications.

work.title: Technical Lead - Data Scientist
work.description: Developed AI-driven systems using Gen-AI, LLMs, RAG, and multi-agent architectures. Created Text2SQL bots, deployed Gen-AI algorithms for cancer identification, and optimized supply chain analytics.

work.title: Data Scientist 2
work.description: Built recommendation systems, personalized marketing models, and AI-driven CSSR campaigns. Fine-tuned LLaMA models and implemented reinforcement learning for recommendation optimization.

work.title: AI Developer
work.description: Developed algorithmic trading models, stock trend prediction using ARIMA, and back-testing solutions for financial applications.

work.title: R&D Engineer
work.description: Developed machine learning models for predictive maintenance and vibration control in diamond manufacturing, improving machine reliability and reducing downtime through anomaly detection and failure analysis.
